templateDmTableSql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_dwd.dwd_error_report_dm_yyyymm (
									`timestamp` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL,
									`app_version_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`channel_id` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '渠道ID',
									`app_plat_id` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '应用类型ID',
									`app_id` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'app_id',
									`country_id` MEDIUMINT (9) DEFAULT NULL,
									`region_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`carrier_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`connect_type_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`network_type_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`os_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`os_version_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`device_type` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`device_id` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL,
									`manufacturer_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`manufacturer_model_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`error_message` text,
									`message_id` BIGINT (255) NOT NULL COMMENT '崩溃信息ID',
									`stack_trace` MEDIUMTEXT,
									`stack_trace_path` VARCHAR (512) DEFAULT NULL,
									`decode_stack_trace` MEDIUMTEXT,
									`decode_stack_trace_path` VARCHAR (512) DEFAULT NULL,
									`additional_info` text,
									`additional_info_path` VARCHAR (512) DEFAULT NULL,
									`error_uuid` VARCHAR (512) NOT NULL,
									`image_uuids` MEDIUMTEXT DEFAULT NULL,
									`year` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1900' COMMENT '年',
									`month` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '月',
									`day` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '日',
									`hour` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小时',
									`error_type` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL COMMENT '崩溃类型',
									`error_level` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '崩溃类型等级:0：高，1：中，2：低',
									`store_id` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '时间id',
									INDEX `idx_dwd_error_report_times` (`timestamp`),
									INDEX `idx_dwd_error_report_date` (`year`, `month`, `day`),
									INDEX `idx_dwd_error_report_range` (`store_id`)
								) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
insertSelectSql:
INSERT INTO bi_dwd.dwd_error_report_dm_yyyymm (
									`timestamp`,
									`app_id`,
									`app_version_id`,
									`channel_id`,
									`app_plat_id`,
									`country_id`,
									`region_id`,
									`carrier_id`,
									`connect_type_id`,
									`network_type_id`,
									`os_id`,
									`os_version_id`,
									`device_type`,
									`device_id`,
									`manufacturer_id`,
									`manufacturer_model_id`,
									`error_message`,
									`message_id`,
									`stack_trace`,
									`stack_trace_path`,
									`decode_stack_trace`,
									`decode_stack_trace_path`,
									`additional_info`,
									`additional_info_path`,
									`error_uuid`,
									`image_uuids`,
									`year`,
									`month`,
									`day`,
									`hour`,
									`error_type`,
									`error_level`,
									`store_id`
								) SELECT
									`timestamp`,
									a.`app_id`,
									a.`app_version_id`,
									0,
									b.app_plat_id,
									`country_id`,
									`region_id`,
									`carrier_id`,
									`connect_type_id`,
									`network_type_id`,
									`os_id`,
									`os_version_id`,
									`device_type`,
									`device_id`,
									`manufacturer_id`,
									`manufacturer_model_id`,
									`error_message`,
									`error_message_id`,
									`stack_trace`,
									`stack_trace_path`,
									`decode_stack_trace`,
									`decode_stack_trace_path`,
									`additional_info`,
									`additional_info_path`,
									`error_uuid`,
									`image_uuids`,
									`year`,
									`month`,
									`day`,
									`hour`,
									`error_type`,
									`error_level`,
									`store_id`
								FROM
									bi_ods.ods_app_error_report a
								LEFT JOIN bi_gather.conf_app_info b ON
								    a.app_id = b.id
								WHERE
									1 = 1
								AND `store_id` = ${store_id}
delete_yes_date: delete from bi_dwd.dwd_error_report_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND store_id = ${statisDate}
delete_date: delete from bi_dwd.dwd_error_report_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND store_id < ${statisDate}
